summary: Cave home for player and up to 3 followers--located at Lake Illinata, secret entrance, secret display room, all crafting utilities and plenty of storage!
descriptionHtml:
HELLO ! ! !

In my recent playthrough of an Orc Shaman type of character, I noted that there was a lack of good cave/naturalistic/werewolfesque homes, so I decided to create one.  This is my first mod, and it's currently in BETA testing, so please don't download if you're looking for the finished package.  Technically, it's a fully finished house, with navmesh for followers, custom storage, trophy displays, etc.  I've spent so much time looking over this damn cave that my eyes are bleeding--if you're willing to be a fresh set of eyes to critique, look for little (or not so little) bugs, or just share creative ideas, I would IMMENSELY appreciate it. 

Aesthetically, I wanted to have the "wild" cave feeling, but create a homey sort of atmosphere as well.  I wanted it to feel lived-in.  Let me know if you have any ideas to improve.

Requires all DLC

Credits to:

author: Operatics
